about_the_game:
"The first story of the inevitable bloodbath between the Demon Society and Earth God Entertainment!"



■ Game Introduction ■
- This is a 2D side-scrolling flight shooter.
- You must progress to the final boss with the lives you are given.

■ Worldview description ■
- The world depicts the conflict between the demonic Demon Society, whose ambition is to conquer the human world, and the earthly god Entertainment, who seeks to defend the human world for the sake of justice.



■ Characters ■
- Deoksoon
"Shall we...possess? ...like this?"
- Hong Seohwa
"Do you know the five virtues?"
- WoongJa
"That tree looks strong. Is it a god tree? I'll find out."

■ Controls ■
- Use the WASD to move your character, and the fire key (J) to fire shots.
- Press the skill key (K) to use bombs and charge shots.
- Press the booster key (L) to activate boost effects.



■ Game Features ■
- Monsters with graphics that reflect Korean tradition (monkfish, shaman, goblin, crow)
- You can enjoy the best quality backgrounds.
- Differentiated monster patterns that have not been seen in other shooting games to face you.

■ Precautions ■
- If you quit the game midway through, the score and money you earned will not be saved as data.
- The data will be initialized when you uninstall the game.
detailed_description:
"The first story of the inevitable bloodbath between the Demon Society and Earth God Entertainment!"



■ Game Introduction ■
- This is a 2D side-scrolling flight shooter.
- You must progress to the final boss with the lives you are given.

■ Worldview description ■
- The world depicts the conflict between the demonic Demon Society, whose ambition is to conquer the human world, and the earthly god Entertainment, who seeks to defend the human world for the sake of justice.



■ Characters ■
- Deoksoon
"Shall we...possess? ...like this?"
- Hong Seohwa
"Do you know the five virtues?"
- WoongJa
"That tree looks strong. Is it a god tree? I'll find out."

■ Controls ■
- Use the WASD to move your character, and the fire key (J) to fire shots.
- Press the skill key (K) to use bombs and charge shots.
- Press the booster key (L) to activate boost effects.



■ Game Features ■
- Monsters with graphics that reflect Korean tradition (monkfish, shaman, goblin, crow)
- You can enjoy the best quality backgrounds.
- Differentiated monster patterns that have not been seen in other shooting games to face you.

■ Precautions ■
- If you quit the game midway through, the score and money you earned will not be saved as data.
- The data will be initialized when you uninstall the game.
name: Path of Soul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "The first story of the inevitable blood feud between the Demon Society and Earth God Entertainment!" - Become the protagonist of Earth God Entertainment and enjoy a 2D flying shooter game composed of differentiated patterns.
